name: Everyone Left
description:
Everyone left but you. Or did they ? It seems they were packing but something stopped them... will it stop you too ?

Controls:

WASD - Move

R - Reload

LShift - Sprint

L Mouse Button - Shoot

R Mouse Button - Aim

M - Open Map

Everyone Left is my second game and was created for learning purposes.  It was made using free assets only. I may update it in the future.

Have fun !
